Package it.progettoOOP.filters

Class Filters

java.lang.Object
it.progettoOOP.filters.Filters
public class Filters
extends java.lang.Object
Contains attributes and methods for Filters object It's used for parsing details from Body POST request

    • MinLength

      public int MinLength() throws BadValueException, BadRangeValueException
      It tries to take value "min" from JSONObject length. If it fails, it will be set by default value to min length message contained on a post in array
      Returns:
      the minimum length message
      Throws:
      BadValueException
      BadRangeValueException

    • MaxLength

      public int MaxLength() throws BadValueException, BadRangeValueException
      It tries to take value "max" from JSONObject length. If it fails, it will be set by default value to max length message contained on a post in array
      Returns:
      the maximum length message
      Throws:
      BadValueException
      BadRangeValueException

    • MinShares

      public int MinShares() throws BadValueException, BadRangeValueException
      It tries to take value "min" from JSONObject shares. If it fails, it set by default value to min share value contained on a post in array
      Returns:
      the minimum number of shares
      Throws:
      BadValueException
      BadRangeValueException

    • MaxShares

      public int MaxShares() throws BadValueException, BadRangeValueException
      It tries to take value "max" from JSONObject shares If it fails, it set by default value to max share value contained on a post in array
      Returns:
      the maximum number of shares
      Throws:
      BadValueException
      BadRangeValueException

    • MinReactions

      public int MinReactions() throws BadValueException, BadRangeValueException
      It tries to take value "min" from JSONObject reactions. If it fails, set by default value to min reaction value contained on a post in array
      Returns:
      the minimum number of reactions
      Throws:
      BadValueException
      BadRangeValueException
